abstract: The company also raised its profit forecast for the second time this year, with gains reflecting a surge in aircraft deliveries, especially the 777 and the 737.
snippet: The company also raised its profit forecast for the second time this year, with gains reflecting a surge in aircraft deliveries, especially the 777 and the 737.
lead_paragraph: Boeing reported second-quarter earnings on Wednesday that topped analyst estimates, and it raised its profit forecast for the second time this year.

headline.main: Deliveries Up, Boeing Beats Forecasts of Analysts
headline.print_headline: Deliveries Up, Boeing Beats Forecasts Of Analysts
